name: LD49 - Larry's Whacky Alchemy Lab
description:
Welcome to our Ludum Dare 49 entry!

The theme for this gamejam is "Unstable"

We present you our game:
Larry's Whacky Alchemy Lab

Story

Larry's machine needs alchemical compounds to remain stable. You need to approach the machine and see what compounds it needs. You then must run to the desired compounds and get the right amount of each. You must move quickly, since Larry's machine is about to be completely unstable within 2 minutes at most. Beware that these alchemical compounds are unstable themselves, and you might get a few side-effects along the way.

Feel free to stop by the stabilizer to clean off any side-effects and heal up!

Objective

Feed Larry's machine 15 times the correct alchemical compounds to stabilize Larry's lab. Keep a close watch to your health, some side-effects are harmful.

Controls

  • Walk with WASD or use the arrow keys
  • Interact with objects with E
  • Run while holding shift
  • No mouse required

Credits

Special thanks to my colleague Andrew Alvarez for participating with me on this GameJam.

Another special thanks goes to Emma and Camilia for their support!

Extra

  • Game made with Game Maker Studio 2
  • Art made with Aseprite
  • Sounds generated with Bfxr
